title: Breakingviews TV: Water woes
text:
Breakingviews TV: Water woes 4:04pm GMT - 04:02 
Cape Town may soon have to turn off its taps thanks to little rain and poor governance. Jennifer Saba and Antony Currie explain how pricing water properly would help arid regions manage scarce supplies more sustainably. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Cape Town may soon have to turn off its taps thanks to little rain and poor governance. Jennifer Saba and Antony Currie explain how pricing water properly would help arid regions manage scarce supplies more sustainably.
